Class FireTrap

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameObject
      • FireTrap
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Object2D

    public class FireTrap
extends GameObject
    Allows us to create firetraps and load images for the explosion. Keeps track of zombies in list to see if they have touched a trap. If they do set one off, it plays the animation, sound, and changes the surrounding tiles to burnt.

      • update

        public void update(GameMap map,
                   Player player)
        Updates each fire trap every timer tick. Checks for zombie and player intersections. Reacts appropriately.
